Movies.Title: Rocky
Movies.Plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Comments.Comment: No me gusto, actuaba un frances!
Esta muy bueno el proyecto chicos, los espero el año que viene en base de datos

Movies.Title: King Kongo
Movies.Plot: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

Comments.Comment: No me gusto, actuaba un frances!
Esta muy bueno el proyecto chicos, los espero el año que viene en base de datos

Movies.Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Movies.Plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
